Plot histograms:

ggplot(data=micro_ct_dataset, aes(x=var)) +
  geom_histogram(fill="steelblue", color="black") +
  ggtitle("Histogram of Var")


#create scatterplot of var1 vs. var2 using stain as color variable

ggplot(data=micro_ct_dataset, aes(x=var1, y=var2, color=Stain)) + 
  geom_point()

#Compute summary statistics by Stains:

group_by(micro_ct_dataset, Stain) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    median = median(Hindgut_PTC, na.rm = TRUE),
    IQR = IQR(var, na.rm = TRUE)
  )

ggline(micro_ct_dataset, x = "Stain", y = "var", 
       add = c("mean_se", "jitter"), 
       order = c("Lugols", "Lugols_PTA1", "Lugols_PTA2"),
       ylab = "Probabilistic tissue contrast ", xlab = "Stain")


EDA

library(DataExplorer)
data_list <- list(Stain)
plot_str(data_list)
